item.title: SQL Sever Synonyms, Entity Framework, & Integrated Security
item.description: Scenario This may be an edge case, but I spent enough time (a couple of days) spinning on this that I thought it warranted a signpost on the Internet. Suppose we have the following scenario before us: Basics We’re building an ASP.Net web application Entity Framework has been chosen as our ORM SQL Server (any version supporting Synonyms) is our backend database server of choice Details
